title: 3D Virtual Reality-Based English Communication Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: English communication enhancement course for mathematics education managers/leaders. Combines smartphone-based 3D virtual environments with offline workshops

learning_goals: Performing goal-based English communication tasks in a 3D virtual environment with over 80% accuracy
Learners can utilize five or more job-related English expressions through real-time voice interaction.
Learners can apply three or more communication strategies for mathematics education through role-play simulations in virtual spaces.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
